about_the_game:
Deconstruction Simulator: Prologue is just part of the gameplay that awaits you in the full version of the game.

With realistic physics, immersive gameplay, and a wide array of tasks, this game offers unique gameplay in the world of construction and destruction. Are you ready to build your empire from the ground up? Start your deconstruction journey today!

PRICE STUFF TO RECYCLE:

In the Deconstruction Simulator: Prologue, your first task is to assess the condition of the items that can be salvaged from the houses that are going to be demolished. Carefully check each piece and assign appropriate prices based on their potential value in the recycling market. Your keen eye and knowledge of recyclable materials will be crucial in maximizing your profits. Experience the excitement and challenges of the demolition and recycling industry!

DECONSTRUCT THE PROPERTY:

Equipped with a wide range of specialized tools and machinery, it's time to bring down the buildings! Take control of powerful demolition equipment and carefully deconstruct the property piece by piece. Remember safety protocols and to check that no one is left at home! Grab a hammer, light off the torch, and get some stuff to sell!

RECYCLE HOUSEHOLD AND APPLIANCES:

Once you've successfully demolished a house, it's time to sort through the debris and extract valuable materials. From copper cables to pieces of metal, plastic and debris, carefully separate each raw material and categorize recyclable items! Utilize the recycling facilities to process and prepare these materials for resale.

SELL RECYCLED EQUIPMENT TO CUSTOMERS:

With a stockpile of recycled equipment, you can establish your own store and attract customers looking for cost-effective alternatives. Show off your inventory of refurbished items, salvaged furniture, and other recycled goods to the clients. Negotiate prices and satisfy the needs of your customers while expanding your reputation in the recycling industry.

EXPAND YOUR BUSINESS:

As your business thrives, seize opportunities to expand your operations. Invest in new machinery, hire additional staff, and explore new locations to demolish and recycle. Establish partnerships with local businesses, collaborate on large-scale projects, and become the go-to contractor for sustainable deconstruction and recycling services.

name: Deconstruction Simulator: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7th gen / AMD Ryzen 5 1st gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Arc A580 / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommend installation on an SSD drive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10th gen / AMD Ryzen 5 3rd gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Arc A770 / AMD Radeon RX 5700XT 8GB / NVIDIA RTX 2070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommend installation on an SSD drive

short_description: The Prologue is just part of the gameplay that awaits you in the full version of the game. Experience the thrilling world of demolition and recycling! Take on the role of a skilled demolition manager and transform unwanted items into valuable resources.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish
